# tf.estimator.RunConfig

### `class tf.estimator.RunConfig`



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/estimator/run_config.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.1/tensorflow/python/estimator/run_config.py).
